an4.244:1.3: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, coram agucarim gahetva ranno dasseyyum:
an4.244:1.7: ‘gacchatha, bho, imam purisam dalhaya rajjuya pacchabaham galhabandhanam bandhitva khuramundam karitva kharassarena panavena rathikaya rathikam singhatakena singhatakam parinetva dakkhinena dvarena nikkhametva dakkhinato nagarassa sisam chindatha’ti.
an4.244:1.8: Tamenam ranno purisa dalhaya rajjuya pacchabaham galhabandhanam bandhitva khuramundam karitva kharassarena panavena rathikaya rathikam singhatakena singhatakam parinetva dakkhinena dvarena nikkhametva dakkhinato nagarassa sisam chindeyyum.
an4.244:1.10: ‘papakam vata, bho, ayam puriso kammam akasi garayham sisacchejjam.
an4.244:1.11: Yatra hi nama ranno purisa dalhaya rajjuya pacchabaham galhabandhanam bandhitva khuramundam karitva kharassarena panavena rathikaya rathikam singhatakena singhatakam parinetva dakkhinena dvarena nikkhametva dakkhinato nagarassa sisam chindissanti.
an4.244:1.12: So vatassaham evarupam papakammam na kareyyam garayham sisacchejjan’ti.
an4.244:1.13: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhussa va bhikkhuniya va evam tibba bhayasanna paccupatthita hoti parajikesu dhammesu.
an4.244:1.14: Tassetam patikankham—anapanno va parajikam dhammam na apajjissati, apanno va parajikam dhammam yathadhammam patikarissati.
an4.244:2.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso kalavattham paridhaya kese pakiritva musalam khandhe aropetva mahajanakayam upasankamitva evam vadeyya:
an4.244:2.2: ‘aham, bhante, papakammam akasim garayham mosallam, yena me ayasmanto attamana honti tam karomi’ti.
an4.244:2.4: ‘papakam vata, bho, ayam puriso kammam akasi garayham mosallam.
an4.244:2.5: Yatra hi nama kalavattham paridhaya kese pakiritva musalam khandhe aropetva mahajanakayam upasankamitva evam vakkhati:
an4.244:2.6: “aham, bhante, papakammam akasim garayham mosallam, yena me ayasmanto attamana honti tam karomi”ti.
an4.244:2.7: So vatassaham evarupam papakammam na kareyyam garayham mosallan’ti.
an4.244:2.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhussa va bhikkhuniya va evam tibba bhayasanna paccupatthita hoti sanghadisesesu dhammesu, tassetam patikankham—anapanno va sanghadisesam dhammam na apajjissati, apanno va sanghadisesam dhammam yathadhammam patikarissati.
an4.244:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso kalavattham paridhaya kese pakiritva bhasmaputam khandhe aropetva mahajanakayam upasankamitva evam vadeyya:
an4.244:3.3: Yena me ayasmanto attamana honti tam karomi’ti.
an4.244:3.5: ‘papakam vata, bho, ayam puriso kammam akasi garayham bhasmaputam.
an4.244:3.6: Yatra hi nama kalavattham paridhaya kese pakiritva bhasmaputam khandhe aropetva mahajanakayam upasankamitva evam vakkhati:
an4.244:3.8: yena me ayasmanto attamana honti tam karomi”ti.
an4.244:3.9: So vatassaham evarupam papakammam na kareyyam garayham bhasmaputan’ti.
an4.244:3.10: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhussa va bhikkhuniya va evam tibba bhayasanna paccupatthita hoti pacittiyesu dhammesu, tassetam patikankham—anapanno va pacittiyam dhammam na apajjissati, apanno va pacittiyam dhammam yathadhammam patikarissati.
an4.244:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso kalavattham paridhaya kese pakiritva mahajanakayam upasankamitva evam vadeyya:
an4.244:4.3: Yena me ayasmanto attamana honti tam karomi’ti.
an4.244:4.5: ‘papakam vata, bho, ayam puriso kammam akasi garayham upavajjam.
an4.244:4.6: Yatra hi nama kalavattham paridhaya kese pakiritva mahajanakayam upasankamitva evam vakkhati:
an4.244:4.8: yena me ayasmanto attamana honti tam karomi”ti.
an4.244:4.9: So vatassaham evarupam papakammam na kareyyam garayham upavajjan’ti.
an4.244:4.10: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhussa va bhikkhuniya va evam tibba bhayasanna paccupatthita hoti patidesaniyesu dhammesu, tassetam patikankham—anapanno va patidesaniyam dhammam na apajjissati, apanno va patidesaniyam dhammam yathadhammam patikarissati.
